description: For each treatment plan order from an advanced order group in a treatment day of a treatment plan, this table specifies whether the order was selected and added to the plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order group record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DT
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ADV_GRP_ORD_SEL_YN
columns.description:
For each treatment plan order from an advanced order group in a treatment day of a treatment plan, this column stores a yes/no flag indicating whether the order was ever selected and added to the plan. This will be true even if the order group was added to the plan in the past and later deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
